com.googlecode.catchexception.apis.internal.hamcrest

Class ExceptionNoCauseMatcher<T extends Exception>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<T>
      • com.googlecode.catchexception.apis.internal.hamcrest.ExceptionNoCauseMatcher<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - an exception subclass
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.hamcrest.Matcher<T>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing

    public class ExceptionNoCauseMatcher<T extends Exception>
extends org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<T>
    Creates a matcher that matches an exception that has no cause.

    rwoo
